name: SleepRolling Pangolin
description:
Try to keep the sleep-rolling pangolin alive by placing different tiles that affect its movement in order to reach the finish tile. Select (left click) tile type on the bottom left of your screen, then place it (left click) or remove it (right click) on any existing tile (except for black one). All tiles effect and controls are available by clicking the info button on the bottom right of the screen.

This is a WebGL version, if you want better graphics, download Windows, MacOS or Linux version at : http://nicard.cyril.free.fr/partage/Public/

This game was made in 72h by Daepso and Khyrgrim for Ludum Dare 46.

Thanks to Nytrouss and CZG for some level design. Special thanks to raphael.samakh (Pangolin drawing) and Kekours (Music).

There are 20 levels for now and a special challenge on the last one.

I hope you’ll enjoy the challenge and thank you for playing.

Khyrgrim
